title: Service Learning-Based Social Studies Instructional Design Practicum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories (ADDIE Model: Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) and social studies content knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducting service-learning projects in collaboration with actual community institutions (schools, welfare organizations, etc.)

learning_goals: Learners can establish service-learning project goals by analyzing real-world educational needs
Learners can create instructional design documents tailored to target institutions and incorporate feedback
Learners can maintain continuous communication with project team members using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
